title: Blobby!
description: In this coding challenge, I simulate a blob-like shape with wobbly edges using beginShape(), endShape(), polar coordinates, and perlin noise.

timestamps.title: Whiteboard explanation of ellipse vs beginShape/endShape
Into the code...using the Blob class and creating an ellipse using beginShape/endShape
Random r value to create a noisy random ellipse
Getting a blobby shape via a sine wave using the 'offset' variable
